messages.subject: Re: OT wanted to share good news
messages.msgSnippet: Won t you be subject to the curriculum of the school district doing it that way?--eeww. Are you able to homeschool via a private school affidavit? That s how I
messages.messageBody:
Won't you be subject to the curriculum of the school district doing it that way?--eeww. Are you able to homeschool via a private school affidavit? That's how I do it in CA. Then I have no ties to any school.
~~Juillet


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "jennifercroce37" <jennifercroce37@...> wrote:
>
> I just wanted to share that I got my approval today from my Superintendent to homeschool in September. I am going to resubmit my infomation to start ASAP. Thanks to everyone for your encouragement to start now instead of waiting until the fall, I think we will all be a lot happier.
>
> Take care,
> Jen
>

messages.subject: OT wanted to share good news
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to share that I got my approval today from my Superintendent to homeschool in September.  I am going to resubmit my infomation to start ASAP.
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to share that I got my approval today from my Superintendent to homeschool in September. I am going to resubmit my infomation to start ASAP. Thanks to everyone for your encouragement to start now instead of waiting until the fall, I think we will all be a lot happier.

Take care,
Jen
